traits.name: Charge
entries: If Baphomet moves at least 10 feet straight toward a target and then hits it with a gore attack on the same turn, the target takes an extra 16 ({@damage 3d10}) piercing damage. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a {@dc 25} Strength saving throw or be pushed up to 10 feet away and knocked {@condition prone}.

traits.name: Labyrinthine Recall
entries: Baphomet can perfectly recall any path he has traveled, and he is immune to the {@spell maze} spell.

traits.name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day)
entries: If Baphomet fails a saving throw, he can choose to succeed instead.

traits.name: Magic Resistance
entries: Baphomet has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

traits.name: Reckless
entries: At the start of his turn, Baphomet can gain advantage on all melee weapon attack rolls during that turn, but attack rolls against him have advantage until the start of his next turn.

actions.name: Multiattack
entries: Baphomet makes three attacks: one with Heartcleaver, one with his bite, and one with his gore attack.

actions.name: Heartcleaver
entries: Melee atk +17 to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. 21 (2d10 + 10 damage) slashing damage.

actions.name: Bite
entries: Melee atk +17 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. 19 (2d8 + 10 damage) piercing damage.

actions.name: Gore
entries: Melee atk +17 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. 17 (2d6 + 10 damage) piercing damage.

actions.name: Frightful Presence
entries: Each creature of Baphomet's choice within 120 feet of him and aware of him must succeed on a DC 18 Wisdom saving throw or become {@condition frightened} for 1 minute. A {@condition frightened} creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success. These later saves have disadvantage if Baphomet is within line of sight of the creature.
If a creature succeeds on any of these saves or the effect ends on it, the creature is immune to Baphomet's Frightful Presence for the next 24 hours.

legendary.name: Heartcleaver Attack
entries: Baphomet makes a melee attack with Heartcleaver.

legendary.name: Charge (Costs 2 Actions)
entries: Baphomet moves up to his speed, then makes a gore attack.

spellcasting.name: Innate Spellcasting
